please
give me
at school
Listen!
Here are my boys and girls.
Robert, Bobby
Mary, Marie
NOTE: Children will be asked to go to the teacher’s desk, pick up a book, a
pencil, or a piece of paper and give it to the teacher. The teacher is
asked to choose someone, in each case, with the name mentioned or someone
to play the part if there is no one who has that name.
Three times a book will be handed to the teacher; twice, a pencil; once, a
piece of paper.
NOTE: A chart or picture book of things the pupils learn in French is suggested
in this lesson. Pictures cut out and pasted on chart, cards or in a note¬
book will be helpful in games and in review work.
